verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> I was <S%H8055>glad<s%> when they <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, Let us <S%H1980>go<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> is <S%H1129>built<s%> as a <S%H5892>city<s%> that is <S%H7945>compact<s%> <S%H2266><s%> together: <S%H3162><s%>

Whither <S%H7945><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> go <S%H5927>up,<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H3050>LORD,<s%> unto the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> are <S%H3427>set<s%> <S%H3678>thrones<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> the <S%H3678>thrones<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>
Pray <S%H7592><s%> for the <S%H7965>peace<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> they shall <S%H7951>prosper<s%> that <S%H157>love<s%> thee.
Peace <S%H7965><s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> within thy <S%H2426>walls,<s%> and <S%H7962>prosperity<s%> within thy <S%H759>palaces.<s%>
For <S%H4616><s%> my <S%H251>brethren<s%> and <S%H7453>companions'<s%> sakes, I will <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H1696>say,<s%> <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be within thee.
Because <S%H4616>of<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> thy <S%H2896>good.<s%>
